knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)


## ---- install the package, eval = FALSE--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
## install.packages("MolgenisArmadillo")


## ---- load the package-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
library(MolgenisArmadillo)


## ---- login to armadillo-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
armadillo.login("https://armadillo-demo.molgenis.net/")


## ---- create the subset definition object------------------------------------------------------------------------------
subset_definition <- armadillo.subset_definition(
  vars = "vignettes/data/subset/vars.csv")
subset_definition


## ---- create a subset in dry-run mode----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
not_available <- armadillo.subset(
	source_project = "gecko",
	new_project = "study1",
	subset_def = subset_definition,
	dry_run = TRUE
)
not_available


## ---- running the subset for real--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
armadillo.subset(
	source_project = "gecko",
	new_project = "study1",
	subset_def = subset_definition, 
	dry_run = FALSE
)
